    • pasteClipboard

      public static String pasteClipboard() throws IOException, UnsupportedFlavorException
      Gets copied text from system clipboard.
      Returns:
      Returns the latest text in the system clipboard.
      Throws:
      IOException - Signals that an I/O exception to some sort has occurred.
      UnsupportedFlavorException - Signals that the requested data is not supported in this flavor.

    • openFolder

      public static int openFolder(String path) throws IOException
      Open a folder from system file explorer.
      Parameters:
      path - The path you want to open.
      Returns:
      Returns specific number, 1 means successful, 0 means the path is not a folder, or it doesn't exist and -1 means this class is supported on the current platform.
      Throws:
      IOException - Signals that an I/O exception to some sort has occurred.

    • openFile

      public static int openFile(String path) throws IOException
      Open a file exists in the current system.
      Parameters:
      path - The path you want to open.
      Returns:
      Returns specific number, 1 means successful, 0 means the path is not a file, or it doesn't exist and -1 means this class is supported on the current platform.
      Throws:
      IOException - Signals that an I/O exception to some sort has occurred.

    • takeFullScreenShot

      public static boolean takeFullScreenShot(String savePath) throws AWTException, IOException
      Take a screenshot from entire screen.
      Parameters:
      savePath - The path you want to save the image into.
      Returns:
      True if taking screenshot was successful and false if not.
      Throws:
      AWTException - Signals that an Abstract Window Toolkit exception has occurred
      IOException - Signals that an I/O exception to some sort has occurred.
